languages.text: "Я столько слышал о ваших добрых деяниях... для меня честь разговаривать с вами!"

traits.locale_text: "Я столько слышал о ваших добрых деяниях... для меня честь разговаривать с вами!"

languages.text: "I have heard so much about your benevolent deeds... It is an honour to speak with you!"
languages.original_text: "Я столько слышал о ваших добрых деяниях... для меня честь разговаривать с вами!"

traits.locale_text: "I heard so much about your good deeds... It is an honour for me to talk with you!"
"I heard so much about your good deeds... It is an honour for me to talk with you!"
"I've heard so much about your incredible deeds... It is an honour for me to speak with you!"
"I've heard so much about your incredible deeds... It is an honour for me to speak with you!"
"I have heard so much about your benevolent deeds... It is an honour to speak with you!"

languages.text: “我听说了许多关于您的仁慈事迹……能与您交谈是我的荣幸！”
languages.original_text: "I have heard so much about your benevolent deeds... It is an honour to speak with you!"

traits.locale_text: “我听说了许多关于您的仁慈事迹……能与您交谈是我的荣幸！”

languages.text: « J'ai tant entendu parler de votre bienveillance héroïque... C'est un honneur de vous rencontrer ! »
languages.original_text: "I have heard so much about your benevolent deeds... It is an honour to speak with you!"

traits.locale_text: « J'ai tant entendu parler de votre bienveillance héroïque... C'est un honneur de vous rencontrer ! »

languages.text: 「あなたの慈悲深き偉業の数々はお聞きしました…お話できて光栄です！」
languages.original_text: "I have heard so much about your benevolent deeds... It is an honour to speak with you!"

traits.locale_text: 「あなたの慈悲深き偉業の数々はお聞きしました…お話できて光栄です！」

languages.text: «He oído hablar de su gran benevolencia... ¡es un gran honor poder hablar con usted!».
languages.original_text: "I have heard so much about your benevolent deeds... It is an honour to speak with you!"

traits.locale_text: «He oído hablar de su gran benevolencia... ¡es un gran honor poder hablar con usted!».

languages.text: "Ich habe so viel von Euren barmherzigen Taten gehört ... Es ist eine Ehre, mit Euch zu sprechen!"
languages.original_text: "I have heard so much about your benevolent deeds... It is an honour to speak with you!"

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe so viel von Euren barmherzigen Taten gehört ... Es ist eine Ehre, mit Euch zu sprechen!"
"Ich habe so viel von Euren unglaublichen Taten gehört ... Es ist eine Ehre, mit Euch zu sprechen!"

languages.text: "İyi amellerine dair o kadar çok şey duydum ki... Seninle konuşmak benim için şereftir!"
languages.original_text: "I have heard so much about your benevolent deeds... It is an honour to speak with you!"
